WorkItem.Description:
I am working on a metro style application at Windows 8 release preview and visual studio 12. 
 
I need to move and rotate an image using mouse after clicking (selecting) it. I want to rotate this image at any angle, not just 90, 180 and /or 270 degree. 
 
Any samples code for it? Thanks.
WorkItem.Summary: How to move and rotate an image using Javascript and html5 at metro style apps?
